description: Generate a changelog report from repository commits and tags. Part of git-extras. More information: https://github.com/tj/git-extras/blob/master/Commands.md#git-changelog.

useCases.description: Update existing file or create a new History.md file with the commit messages since the latest Git tag:

List pretty formatted range of commits between the tag 0.5.0 and the tag 1.0.0:
List pretty formatted range of commits between the commit 0b97430 and the tag 1.0.0:
